nodes.text: The Duel of the Fates was a music video released in 1999 to further promote Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. It featured a combination of film clips with dialogue and behind-the-scenes footage of the film's production.
The complete music video was included as a bonus feature on the Episode I video game and on the film's DVD releases.
The audio track from this video was also included as a bonus track on the 2-disc "Ultimate Edition" release of the Episode I soundtrack album.
